programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Artist Sarah returns to her roots in the Durham Dales to create a radical, cannabis-based house. But as costs go through the roof, can she get her hempcrete hub of a home over the line?

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Engaged couple Sharon and Paul from Shropshire would love to own a holiday home in the seaside town of Gran Alacant on Spains southern Costa Blanca. Jean Johansson shows them what £135k can buy.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Having retired last year, Carlene Barnard wants to buy a holiday home on the Costa Blanca so that all of her family, two kids, six grandchildren and one great grandchild, can spend quality time together in the Spanish sunshine.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In Northamptonshire, makeup artist Jules Osmany hopes that her Indian/ Moroccan fusion menu and laid-back attitude to life will win her the prize.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Second up in Northamptonshire is funeral service manager Peter Pickering, who is dead set on hosting a traditional dinner party reminiscent of the 1920s. However, his guests dont like the sound of his bread and butter pudding.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Stay-at-home mum Stephanie Reeders nerves are evident from the outset on her night in Northamptonshire. Shes planning to serve classic fish and chips while offering a glamorous swishing session for fun.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Tweny-six-year-old business planning manager Lauren Oxlade is the penultimate host in Northamptonshire. She is an organised and passionate cook and has a few surprising friends who shes invited along to her party.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Last to try his hand in Northamptonshire is managing director and proud northerner Carl Johnson, with a menu that includes gammon cooked in two litres of cola.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Brothers Richard and Mick host at their pub in the Peak District. One guest does an impression of a bird in a cave. And the hosts struggle to brush off some feedback.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Leah Charles-King helps Julie and Leo find the perfect holiday home on the southern Costa Blanca for all three generations of their family to enjoy. With a maximum budget of £120,000, Leah shows them five impressive properties.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Laura and Nick dream of making a permanent move to Estepona on Spains Costa del Sol with their beloved dog Poppy. Can Jean Johansson find the perfect place for their £160,000 budget?

programme.title: Fred Dibnahs Industrial Age
programme.desc: Starting in Cornwall and travelling all the way to Scotland, Fred turns his eye to the practice of mining. On his travels, he finds out exactly how tin, slate, lead and coal were all extracted from the ground.

programme.title: Railways: The Making of a Nation
programme.desc: The railways enabled us to live further and further from the places where we worked. Before the age of steam you would need a horse to travel long distances on land. Throughout the 19th and 20th centuries our railways encouraged the development of suburbia inhabited by a new type of resident and worker - the commuter.

programme.title: Imagine...
programme.desc: Marina Abramovic is the reigning queen of performance art. She invites Alan Yentob into her home, opens up her enormous personal archive and travels back to her birthplace, Belgrade. Her early, provocative work was once dismissed, but today thousands go to see her perform pieces that can last for weeks, even months at a time. By using just her own body and pushing her physical and psychological boundaries, she has become an international artistic superstar.

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Oliver Cromwell rises from obscurity, challenges King Charles I in the English Civil War, and ultimately orders the Kings execution - as he says, a it was a cruel necessity. programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: This episode follows young Queen Victoria as she marries her true love Albert, and has to put up with the open sewers at the not-so-luxurious Buckingham Palace. Also featuring Australian outlaw Ned Kelly, and the Great Hedge of India.

programme.desc: A round-up of the days news.

programme.title: Top Gear

programme.title: Missing in Paradise: Searching for Sarm
programme.desc: Tir Dhondy retraces Sarms last known movements before her disappearance from a charter yacht in 2021. She hears Sarms boyfriend, Ryan Bane, give his account of what happened through his lawyer.

programme.title: Juice
programme.desc: The new Jamma is reliable and consistent - he wants to respect Guys boundaries, but he also needs Saifs address from Guy so that he can try and reconnect with his dad. Guy is pleasantly surprised by the new and improved Jamma. Winnies dad is visiting for some quality father-daughter bonding, but shes not yet come out as straight to him and asks Isaac to play along.

programme.title: Juice
programme.desc: Guy and Jamma visit Guys family home to pick up his childhood diary for writing inspiration. When Jamma meets Guys mother and brother, he makes a perfect first impression, much to Guys despair. But all hell breaks loose when an unwelcome guest makes a frightening and confronting appearance.

programme.title: Juice
programme.desc: Its Guys book launch, but the venue has been double-booked with a wedding. When the bride goes missing, its Jammas time to shine - he goes to look for her to save both the launch and the wedding. Meanwhile, its still awkward between Winnie and Isaac after their near kiss. And Farida uses the launch as her chance to get Saif to sign the divorce papers.

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: A special episode of the historical sketch show, featuring the rotten rulers from this series. Including naughty Napoleon annoying his Josephine, and horrid Henry VIII getting married again. Theres also a song from wily Winston Churchill and Rattus to guide the way as host.

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May buy old British roadsters from Jensen-Healey, Lotus and TVR before taking a wistful journey through the remnants of the UKs sports car industry, starting in Norfolk and ending up at the mothballed TVR factory in Blackpool. Also, Jeremy takes to the test track in the sensational new Ferrari 458 Italia, and Hollywood legend Jeff Goldblum is the star in the new reasonably priced car.

programme.title: Our Girl
programme.desc: Lance Corporal Georgie Lane, an experienced army medic joins Captain James and 2 Section on a humanitarian tour to Kenya. She has promised her fiance, Doctor Jamie Cole that shell return home soon to marry him. 2 Section are posted to a refugee camp near the border of Somalia and as soon as they pull into the camp Georgie jumps straight to work when an IED explodes harming many refugees. When aid-worker, Kicki, is kidnapped, Georgies determination to find her lands her in great danger.

programme.title: Film Club
programme.desc: Best friends Evie and Noa have watched films together since they first met. But now Noa has news which is set to change everything.

programme.desc: While Noa attends a taster day for his new job in Bristol, Evie pulls out all the stops for Film Club, theres a lot riding on tonight.

programme.title: Twisted Metal
programme.desc: John Doe, a motormouthed outsider, is offered a chance at a better life, but only if he can successfully deliver a mysterious package across a twisted, postapocalyptic wasteland.

programme.title: Twisted Metal
programme.desc: John finds his mission thwarted by two unpredictable adversaries in Lost Vegas; Agent Stone recruits new members for his cause.

programme.title: Walk the Line
programme.desc: Acclaimed biographical film of country musics legendary `man in black. programme.desc: Secret filming by Panorama reveals evidence of racism, misogyny, and officers revelling in the use of force at one of Londons busiest police stations, Charing Cross. After the murder of Sarah Everard by a serving police officer the Metropolitan Police promised change and says that since 2022 more than 1,400 officers have either been dismissed or have resigned following a clamp down on what it calls "rogue officers".

programme.title: This Is BBC TWO
programme.desc: Preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The roadshow visits Shuttleworth House in Bedfordshire, where treasures include a stunning diamond necklace, props from the James Bond films and an umbrella stand made from a boat.

programme.title: Match of the Day
programme.desc: Kelly Cates presents highlights from Sundays five Premier League games including Manchester Citys trip to Brentford. Ange Postecoglous Nottingham Forest travel to Newcastle, Aston Villa take on Burnley, Brighton go to Wolves and Crystal Palace are the visitors to Evertons new Hill Dickinson Stadium.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: Twenty-four hours a day, the latest national and international stories as they break.

programme.title: Politics Live
programme.desc: Jo Coburn invites a panel of guests to share their opinions on the newsmaking stories of the day.

programme.title: Impossible
programme.desc: Thirty players compete across the series, scoring points by answering questions correctly. However, they must avoid the impossible answers, otherwise they will be eliminated from the show until the next day.

programme.title: Bridge of Lies
programme.desc: Ross Kemp presents as a team of four friends, Georgina, Ross, Sophie and Warren, take on the Bridge of Lies. One by one they all face the bridge, choosing who faces each crossing depending on the question category.

programme.title: Unbeatable
programme.desc: Jason Manford hosts the quiz show where players face a question and pick from a board of six rankable answers. Some answers are good, but only one is unbeatable.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.sub-title: South West England: Starters and Fish
programme.desc: Four chefs compete for south west England with canapes, starters and fish dishes inspired by the Olympics and Paralympics, all hoping to cook at a banquet to wish Team GB athletes luck as they head for Paris 2024.

programme.title: Mountain Gorilla
programme.desc: Looking at the plight of some of the youngest and most vulnerable of the mountain gorilla population.

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: Today, Flog It! comes from Oxburgh Hall in Norfolk. David Harper is excited by a Polynesian war club, while Philip Serrell falls for a sewing machine dating back to 1875.

programme.title: Richard Osmans House of Games
programme.desc: Yinka Bokinni, Ellie Leach, Vicki Michelle and Peter Serafinowicz test their general knowledge skills on this weeks House of Games.

programme.title: Strictly Come Dancing: It Takes Two
programme.desc: Janette Manrara kicks off the week with an exclusive chat with the first couple to be eliminated. backstage gossip from the weekends surviving celebs and their pro dancer. Choreography Corner takes a look back at some of Saturdays performances.

programme.title: Global Eye
programme.desc: Bringing forensic journalism from all corners of the world by BBC Eye, the World Services critically acclaimed investigative unit, and featuring expert global correspondents getting to the heart of the biggest international stories.

programme.title: Mastermind
programme.desc: Clive Myrie hosts the classic quiz. The subjects include the Jurassic Coast, the band Queen and Mickey Mouse cartoons from 1928-1935.

programme.title: Only Connect
programme.desc: Victoria Coren Mitchell hosts the quiz where knowledge only gets you so far. One of the returning teams faced a tie-break in their previous match.

programme.title: University Challenge
programme.desc: In this first-round match, two institutions specialising in science go head-to-head - Imperial College London and Churchill College, Cambridge. Amol Rajan asks the questions.

programme.title: Secrets of the Brain
programme.desc: From playing computer games with chimpanzees to studying modern relationships, Jim Al-Khalili investigates how the brain evolved and how they differ from AI.

programme.title: Cunk on Earth
programme.desc: Cunk tells the story of the birth of two of the worlds great religions and learns what came next: the fall of the Roman Empire, the Dark Ages, the Crusades and Genghis Khan. So a bit of a rough patch for mankind, if were honest.

programme.title: Newsnight
programme.desc: Featuring extensive coverage of the days top national and international news stories, along with explanations about the context and potential aftereffects.

programme.title: BBC Weather
programme.desc: The latest weather forecast.

programme.title: If Beale Street Could Talk
programme.desc: A young African-American woman embraces her pregnancy whilst she and her family set out to prove that her childhood friend and lover was falsely imprisoned and is innocent of the crime he is convicted of.

programme.title: Countryfile
programme.desc: Matt Baker and Charlotte Smith are in Wrexham for the biggest date in the sheepdog trialling calendar - the Supreme. Set against the beautiful backdrop of Brynkinalt Estate, the finest dogs and handlers from across the UK and Ireland go head-to-head, showing off their skill, instinct and teamwork. After months of training and a year of tough qualifying trials, it all comes down to this - only one can walk away as Supreme Champion.

programme.title: Waterloo Road
programme.desc: Dwayne is under pressure when Ashton exposes his deepest secrets to the entire school. Meanwhile, Nisha is conflicted when her personal and professional worlds collide.

programme.title: Waterloo Road
programme.desc: Hope and Portia go head-to-head as they battle for attention. Elsewhere, Dariuss negligence has devastating consequences, and Schuey is rocked when an unexpected visitor ruffles feathers.

programme.title: The Dengineers
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Cammy is one of six siblings. Youd think that would be reason enough for him to deserve his own space, but Cammy also has Sensory Processing Disorder. Sometimes the bustle of his busy family home is too much for him, and when he gets agitated he knows its too much for his siblings. He thinks they need a break from him as much as he needs a break from them. Cammys SPD means he can be oversensitive to certain sounds, smells textures and flavours.

programme.desc: Dick and Dom meet mans future best friend - robots. The boys reveal three geniuses whose ideas have changed the world of robotics. They come face to face with one of the worlds largest humanoid robots and create their very own destructive robot.

programme.title: Horrible Histories

programme.title: Danger Mouse

programme.desc: When Uncle Rad and Frisky accidentally turn up to babysit Bluey and Bingo on the same night, they have to work together to make Bluey feel better about babysitter put-downs.

programme.title: Go Jetters
programme.desc: Glitch enlists the help of a sceptical Foz and a friendly yak in order to find a yeti in the Himalayas. But when a snowstorm traps them in a cave on the mountainside, the rest of the Go Jetters must battle the elements to find their friends.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.sub-title: The Tale of the Puddleduck Disaster
programme.desc: When Jemima is short on fruity flapjack ingredients for her hungry ducklings, she misunderstands Peters advice and heads to Mr McGregors garden. Its up to Peter to launch a daring rescue mission before the dizzy duck gets caught by the Cat, or worse, Mr McGregor.

programme.title: Octonauts: Above and Beyond
programme.desc: The Octonauts expand their exploration beyond the sea - and onto land. With new rides and new friends, they are prepared to protect any habitats and animals at risk on land or under the water.

programme.title: Numberblocks
programme.desc: The Odd Blocks are all set to meet at their special club. Can Numberblock One join it?

programme.title: Alphablocks
programme.desc: S is feeling a bit sad but T, A and P are here to help and before long, everyone is tap dancing. Oh dear! T has no tea, A has too many apples but S is sagging so the others want to help. P pops in and they try some word magic - perhaps a comforting pat or a big musical number? This episode introduces the letters S, A, T and P and the words sat, pat, tap and taps.

programme.title: Nick Copes Popcast
programme.desc: While sorting through his hats, Nick realises his favourite hat is missing. Can todays Popcast song help him find it?

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: A nice song about teaching Duggly how to use the potty properly.

programme.title: Playtime Towers
programme.desc: Bella has fun pretending to be a cat, a Bella-Cat. Together with Lift, she visits Tincy the Spider in the SingSong Forest, who sings a spider rhyme, all about taily-waily animals!

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Bing has enough money to buy one thing in Padgets shop but he finds it hard to choose between all the lovely things. After much deliberation Bing chooses a camper van, but on the way home he begins to regret his decision.

programme.title: Yakka Dee
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say bike. See lots of different bikes doing lots of different things. Theres a hopping bike, a shopping bike and even a dinosaur riding a bike! Dee has a new green and shiny bike and goes for a bike ride with friends.

programme.title: Lu and the Bally Bunch
programme.desc: The children collect leaves and twigs in the forest for a collage; Lu finds a golden leaf and believes it is the only golden leaf in the forest; when Barnaby also finds a gold one, she thinks he stole hers instead.

programme.title: Piggy Builders
programme.desc: The Piggies are called on multiple missions and decide to split up. They soon realise they were all working on Fionas surprise birthday! Nothing is ready? Mission impossible? Not if they join forces!

programme.title: Twirlywoos
programme.desc: The Twirlywoos see a hiker joining things onto his rucksack, and decide to add a few of their own. In the Boat the Twirlywoo Screen provides some dots for the Twirlywoos to join up.

programme.title: Something Special: Were All Friends
programme.desc: Justin and his friends visit a living museum to experience life in the olden days. Meanwhile, Mr Tumble has overslept because his alarm clock is broken, but he has a plan.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: In Tummy Tales, a child makes party invitations, and in Teletubbyland a magical party invitation arrives. Its an invitation for the Teletubbies to attend the Tiddlytubbies party.

programme.title: The Baby Club
programme.desc: Nigel and Baby Bear welcome babies Isobel, Idris, Lincoln, Amber, Amelia, Jason, Willow and their grown-ups. Inside everyones bags are pans which are explored through discovery, play, song and story. Grown-ups at home are encouraged to take part by hiding baby appropriate pans inside a fabric bag or pillowcase for them to reveal and explore with their baby.

programme.title: Maddie and Triggs
programme.desc: Maddie, an adventurous youngster who happens to be visually impaired, sets out with her best doggy friend Triggs to discover the music and adventure in the sounds of the world around them.

programme.title: Dylans Playtime Adventures
programme.desc: Dylan the doctor wants to make his patients better, but when one of them comes in with something unusual, he has to reach down into his silly medical knowledge vault.

programme.title: Kiri and Lou
programme.desc: Kiri and Lou are going to have a feast of their favourite fruit: yum yum baronies. But Lou loses control and eats them all before Kiri can have any!

programme.title: Vegesaurs
programme.desc: Ginger the Tricarrotops explores the world of the crunchiest era, going on adventures throughout the colourful Vegesaur Valley.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Dad takes care of the girls evening routine when Mum heads out to a baby shower, and he has to try extra hard to keep them entertained.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: The Squirrels notice that Happy looks and seems different - he is frowning, his smile is upside down, and hes wearing new trainers! When they check in on him, Happy is frustrated, but he cant seem to identify where his frustration is coming from. They turn to Duggee for help, who uses his feeling cards to explain an array of feelings to Happy. All the Squirrels help by relaying their past experiences and the feelings that they evoked.

programme.title: The Game Catchers
programme.desc: The Game Catchers land on a seabed-like planet, where they meet three alien children whose favourite game is "Command Colour".

programme.title: Roots and Fruits
programme.desc: Live from the Roots and Fruits Theatre, its Banana revealing an astonishing secret about herself in the opera piece, Ive Got a Secret.

programme.title: Timmy Time
programme.desc: It is gardening time at the Nursery. Harriet hands out seeds to Timmy and his friends and shows them all how to grow plants, but Timmy has trouble growing his.

programme.title: Our Family
programme.desc: We meet five-year-old Henry and his family: Mummy, Mama, and little sister Sophie. Theres lots of fun in store with a breakfast boogie and a visit to a farm. Back at home, they have some bouncy fun on the trampoline.

programme.title: My World Kitchen
programme.desc: Eddies mum is Italian and has taught him how to make a traditional Italian pizza. Eddie makes a delicious cheese and olive pizza using homemade dough and a tasty tomato sauce. His friends are in for a real treat when they see that Eddies mum cooks the pizza in their traditional pizza oven. He tops his pizza with black olives, but some of Eddies friends arent too sure about olives when they taste them on their own.

programme.title: Ferne and Rorys Teeny Tiny Creatures
programme.desc: Bella finds out all about some of the smallest mammals in the UK - mice! Chantelle visits a wildlife group to meet Sean, Mossy, Gabriela and Cara and help them release harvest mice into the wild.

programme.title: Whats in Your Bag?
programme.desc: In this episode, beekeeper Gruff shows us his veil. We find out why its important for Gruff to wear it when hes doing his job.

programme.title: Time for School
programme.desc: Its Silas and his classmates first full day at school! There are lots of things to explore, new friends to make and teachers to meet. After meeting the teachers, the children explore the classroom and outdoor area. At lunchtime, Ottilie and Bryn spot an invisible mouse in the dining hall. Lusungu finds that opening yogurt lids can be a bit tricky.

programme.title: Graces Amazing Machines
programme.desc: Motorbike rider Grace shows off three amazing machines, all of which are different kinds of motorbikes! Grace rides a classic touring bike, then shows off futuristic self-balancing bikes before heading to an indoor motocross course to ride an electric dirt bike.

programme.title: Yakka Dee
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say `donkey and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We meet all sorts of donkeys: a brown donkey, a grey donkey, an eating lots of hay donkey. Theres a nosy donkey, a hee-hawing donkey and even a see-sawing donkey.

programme.title: Numberblocks
programme.desc: One finds a friendly furball, two of them tickle Two and soon Numberland is full of fun and fluffies. Have fun counting and learning how to make sevens with the Numberblocks.

programme.title: Alphablocks
programme.desc: The Alphablocks sing along to a singalong song, in which birds sing and bells ring.

programme.title: Wonderblocks
programme.desc: Little Bear is having big trouble remembering everyones ice cream orders.

programme.title: Colourblocks
programme.desc: Green stages a magic show to introduce her new friends Black and White. Learn the difference between light, bright and dark colours with the Colourblocks.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: It is a rainy day in the Clubhouse which means its a perfect day for a board game. The Squirrels are introduced to Duggees favourite game, Planet Zap - Quest for the Power Orb.

programme.title: Yukee
programme.desc: When Yukees garden plays host to Ray and Easy, the Jazz Frogs, Toad discovers he has had an unlikely influence over their visitors.

programme.title: Something Special
programme.desc: Justin and a friend make a space rocket and play mini golf. Meanwhile, Lord Tumble attempts to teach Mr Tumble how to play golf, but things dont quite go to plan.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Tubby Custard Machine is broken, but The Noo-noo fixes it. The Teletubbies go on a Tubby Custard Ride and make a lovely custardy mess inside and outside Home Dome.

programme.title: Andys Safari Adventures
programme.desc: When park boss Mr Hammond accidentally breaks some acorns in the Jungle Den, its up to Andy to jet off in his safari-mobile to Canada and collect some more. He shrinks down to embark on an epic adventure with a chipmunk, discovering its underground den. Along the way, he also meets a moose and must escape from a horned owl.

programme.title: Waffle the Wonder Dog
programme.desc: AJ takes Evie and Anaya swimming, but Waffle must stay at home with Simon. Refusing to miss out on the fun, Waffle begins an adventure of his own and sets off to find Evie.

programme.title: Topsy and Tim
programme.desc: Tim and Dad are going to Bellford Hospital to pick up Topsy and Mummy. Dad has to bring some special things in to hospital from her bedroom. When Tim and Dad get to Daisy ward, Topsy is in the Playzone with Molly. They are making masks and Tim is given one too. Topsy says goodbye and thanks to everyone shes met on the ward.

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa wants to find the perfect noise to partner his friend Huffty in a tune. He hears an amazing new noise but does not know what made it. He sets out on a noisy discovery to find out how to recreate this wonderful new noise.

programme.title: The Game Catchers
programme.desc: The Cosmo-players arrive on the planet Origami and play Rock-Paper-Scissors, but just as they are about to leave, they discover that their spaceships have disappeared.

programme.title: Octonauts
programme.desc: The Octonauts recruit a shape-shifting mimic octopus to help them recover an important vial of medicinal algae from a moray eels lair.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: When Peter is asked to watch Jemimas egg, he discovers that babysitting is far more dangerous than he could ever have imagined.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: When the Squirrels find Duggee playing saxophone, they want to have a go too. Several pots, balloons, tins, water and tubes later, and the squirrels are making music. And boy, are they loud.

programme.sub-title: Koas Sweet Tooth; Tobys Blurry Blunders

programme.title: Supertato

programme.title: Mojo Swoptops
programme.desc: Nori and Dot are stuck in a tree house without a door. How can Mojo and Bo get them out? By sending the treehouse flying across town, thats how!

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Dad tries to teach Bluey how to play chess, but Mum thinks she is still too young. When Bingo joins in, the kids make up their own rules, but they still cant beat Dad.

programme.desc: The Brooklyn-Bells decorate Dougs bedroom. Waffle tries to help but causes a green paint disaster and escapes into Mrs Hobbs house next door.

programme.desc: The Rodriguezes catch up with Keith and Linda to see how theyve settled into Spanish life, while the Garners see what changes Tracy and Colin have made to their Andalusian abode.

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Includes sport and weather.

programme.title: Joe Wicks: License to Kill
programme.desc: What is the truth around ultra-processed food? Joe Wicks and Dr Chris van Tulleken carry out a highly provocative stunt to convince the government into changing our food laws for good.

programme.title: 24 Hours in Police Custody
programme.desc: Detectives from the Major Crime Unit have a suspect in custody but they are shocked when what their investigation reveals is even more devastating and important than their worst fears.

programme.title: Social Media Monsters
programme.desc: Stories of serious crimes linked to social media. Fifteen-year-old Hollys accounts were hacked and inundated by her ex, in a campaign that culminated in a brutal killing.

programme.title: Educating Yorkshire
programme.desc: This time at Thornhill it is all about the newbies. With a national shortage of teachers and staff leaving the profession, can Mr Burton and his team encourage Josh to find the joy in the job and stick it out at Thornhill?

programme.title: Bardot
programme.desc: Brigitte is 15 years old when she poses for the cover of a new magazine, ELLE; she is quickly scouted by Vadim, the young assistant of the prestigious director Marc Allegret.

programme.title: Taylor: The Star Who Changed the World
programme.desc: The story of the rise and rise of Taylor Swift begins with her ascent from small-town country singer to global pop phenomenon. But a backlash threatens it all.

programme.title: Taskmaster
programme.desc: Maisie Adam and Phil Ellis are repulsed by olives, while Reece Shearsmiths mystified by a voice note. And Alex Horne regrets giving Ania Magliano access to his phone.

programme.title: Mitchell and Webb Are Not Helping
programme.desc: The real cause of climate change? Its good news and bad news. Plus: TVs most wholesome heirloom repair show. A death in the Sweary Aussie family. And the lawyers intervene in the writers room.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off: An Extra Slice
programme.desc: Lorraine Kelly and AJ Odudu dip into Chocolate Week with a fondue review. But whose chocolate tart was doomed from the start, and did anyone have a meltdown?

programme.title: Kidnap

programme.title: Judaai

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Fertility Test
programme.desc: Monica and Chandler have an embarrassing encounter with an old acquaintance at a fertility clinic, Ross plays Cyrano to help Joey woo a professor, and Rachel sneaks into a spa for a massage hoping Phoebe wont find out.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Disappointed to learn that they cannot conceive a baby naturally, Monica and Chandler consider their options. When Chandler invites a handsome colleague round for dinner, Monica and Chandler embarrassingly interview him as a potential sperm donor. Meanwhile, while shopping with Phoebe, Rachel admits that she still has a thing for Joey.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The gang heads to Barbados for a palaeontology convention where Ross is the keynote speaker. Rachel harbours steamy thoughts about Joey while David prepares to propose to Phoebe.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One After Joey and Rachel Kiss
programme.desc: While the friends are still in Barbados, Joey tries to tell Ross about his feelings for Rachel and Ross wants to confess to kissing Joeys girlfriend Charlie, but it is easier said than done. Meanwhile, Monica, Chandler and Phoebe can hear their amorous conversations through the hotels paper-thin walls. Also, Monicas hair problems go from bad to worse, and Phoebe has some bad news for Mikes girlfriend on her birthday.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Ross Is Fine
programme.desc: Ross drinks too much wine while dining with Rachel, Joey and Charlie. Elsewhere, Frank Jr cannot cope with his precocious triplets and pays Phoebe a visit.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel and Joey nervously anticipate their first real date, Monica and Phoebe try to avoid an obnoxious friend with a fake British accent, and Ross emerges from a tanning booth with a two-toned appearance.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel gets Monica and Chandler to delay their long-awaited trip to Vermont for Emmas first birthday bash, but problems ensue when Emma falls asleep and a racy cake turns up.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Rachels Sister Baby-Sits
programme.desc: Rachel regrets trusting her self-indulgent little sister Amy with Emma, Monica regrets asking Joey to write a recommendation letter to the child adoption agency for her, and Phoebe accidentally thwarts the anniversary surprise Mike has in store for her.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross applies for a palaeontology grant, but discovers that Dr Hobart - who allocates such funding - used to go out with his girlfriend Charlie. Meanwhile, Mike wants Phoebe to get rid of one of her bizarre paintings, but neither Rachel nor Monica is keen to take it, and Chandler lies to Joey about watching his audition tape.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Home Study
programme.desc: Monica and Chandler fuss over their apartment as they expect a visit from the adoption worker. Meanwhile, Phoebe and Mike opt for a small wedding and donate the extra money to a childrens charity.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Late Thanksgiving
programme.desc: Monica reluctantly agrees to cook Thanksgiving dinner, but locks everyone out when they turn up late as Joey and Ross went to a hockey game while Rachel and Phoebe took Emma to a baby beauty contest. Monica also receives some adoption news.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Birth Mother
programme.desc: Monica and Chandler are forced to pretend to be a reverend and a doctor when their prospective childs birth mother gets the wrong end of the stick. Meanwhile, Joeys date with Phoebes friend doesnt go well, and Ross is left with an inappropriate outfit for a date with a sexy salesgirl.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Chandler Gets Caught
programme.desc: Phoebe and Rachel see Chandler getting into a car with a mystery woman and follow them to a large house in the suburbs. They tell Monica of their fears and are shocked by the truth.

programme.title: Iain Stirlings Roast The Internet
programme.sub-title: Jon Richardson, Ellie Taylor and Fatiha El-Ghorri
programme.desc: ...Internet. Host Iain Stirling is joined by Jon Richardson, Ellie Taylor and Fatiha El-Ghorri for a scathing takedown of pure internet madness, from awkward influencers to social media fails. (S1, E06)

programme.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad
programme.desc: The boys are back! Bradley and Barney Walsh embark on a 3,000-mile journey through Europe, starting off in the sunny south of Croatia and ending up in the ice-cold Arctic Circle in Scandinavia. Theres no easing his dad in on this trip for Barney. First up, they swing off the roof of Splits iconic football stadium, before diving headfirst into the crystal clear waters of the Adriatic Sea. The action continues when the pair go head to head on aqua bikes alongside a former world champion.

programme.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad
programme.desc: Bradley and Barney leave Croatia behind and say hello to Hungary, where the boys take to the open waters of Lake Balaton for a spot of high-speed catamaran sailing before warming up with some world-famous goulash. The pair finish their time in Budapest, where Barney and Bradley meet a world-famous escapologist.

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: Mike finds himself in the middle between Kristin and Ryan when its discovered that Boyd was never vaccinated for chicken pox.

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: After Kyle is in a minor motorcycle accident, Mandy is worried for his safety, but Ed is more concerned about the companys health insurance rates rising.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Fertility Test
programme.desc: Monica and Chandler have an embarrassing encounter with an old acquaintance at a fertility clinic, Ross plays Cyrano to help Joey woo a professor, and Rachel sneaks into a spa for a massage hoping Phoebe wont find out.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Disappointed to learn that they cannot conceive a baby naturally, Monica and Chandler consider their options. When Chandler invites a handsome colleague round for dinner, Monica and Chandler embarrassingly interview him as a potential sperm donor. Meanwhile, while shopping with Phoebe, Rachel admits that she still has a thing for Joey.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The gang heads to Barbados for a palaeontology convention where Ross is the keynote speaker. Rachel harbours steamy thoughts about Joey while David prepares to propose to Phoebe.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One After Joey and Rachel Kiss
programme.desc: While the friends are still in Barbados, Joey tries to tell Ross about his feelings for Rachel and Ross wants to confess to kissing Joeys girlfriend Charlie, but it is easier said than done. Meanwhile, Monica, Chandler and Phoebe can hear their amorous conversations through the hotels paper-thin walls. Also, Monicas hair problems go from bad to worse, and Phoebe has some bad news for Mikes girlfriend on her birthday.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Ross Is Fine
programme.desc: Ross drinks too much wine while dining with Rachel, Joey and Charlie. Elsewhere, Frank Jr cannot cope with his precocious triplets and pays Phoebe a visit.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel and Joey nervously anticipate their first real date, Monica and Phoebe try to avoid an obnoxious friend with a fake British accent, and Ross emerges from a tanning booth with a two-toned appearance.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel gets Monica and Chandler to delay their long-awaited trip to Vermont for Emmas first birthday bash, but problems ensue when Emma falls asleep and a racy cake turns up.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Rachels Sister Baby-Sits
programme.desc: Rachel regrets trusting her self-indulgent little sister Amy with Emma, Monica regrets asking Joey to write a recommendation letter to the child adoption agency for her, and Phoebe accidentally thwarts the anniversary surprise Mike has in store for her.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross applies for a palaeontology grant, but discovers that Dr Hobart - who allocates such funding - used to go out with his girlfriend Charlie. Meanwhile, Mike wants Phoebe to get rid of one of her bizarre paintings, but neither Rachel nor Monica is keen to take it, and Chandler lies to Joey about watching his audition tape.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Home Study
programme.desc: Monica and Chandler fuss over their apartment as they expect a visit from the adoption worker. Meanwhile, Phoebe and Mike opt for a small wedding and donate the extra money to a childrens charity.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Late Thanksgiving
programme.desc: Monica reluctantly agrees to cook Thanksgiving dinner, but locks everyone out when they turn up late as Joey and Ross went to a hockey game while Rachel and Phoebe took Emma to a baby beauty contest. Monica also receives some adoption news.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Birth Mother
programme.desc: Monica and Chandler are forced to pretend to be a reverend and a doctor when their prospective childs birth mother gets the wrong end of the stick. Meanwhile, Joeys date with Phoebes friend doesnt go well, and Ross is left with an inappropriate outfit for a date with a sexy salesgirl.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Chandler Gets Caught
programme.desc: Phoebe and Rachel see Chandler getting into a car with a mystery woman and follow them to a large house in the suburbs. They tell Monica of their fears and are shocked by the truth.

programme.title: Iain Stirlings Roast The Internet
programme.sub-title: Jon Richardson, Ellie Taylor and Fatiha El-Ghorri
programme.desc: ...Internet. Host Iain Stirling is joined by Jon Richardson, Ellie Taylor and Fatiha El-Ghorri for a scathing takedown of pure internet madness, from awkward influencers to social media fails. (S1, E06)

programme.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad
programme.desc: The boys are back! Bradley and Barney Walsh embark on a 3,000-mile journey through Europe, starting off in the sunny south of Croatia and ending up in the ice-cold Arctic Circle in Scandinavia. Theres no easing his dad in on this trip for Barney. First up, they swing off the roof of Splits iconic football stadium, before diving headfirst into the crystal clear waters of the Adriatic Sea. The action continues when the pair go head to head on aqua bikes alongside a former world champion.

programme.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad
programme.desc: Bradley and Barney leave Croatia behind and say hello to Hungary, where the boys take to the open waters of Lake Balaton for a spot of high-speed catamaran sailing before warming up with some world-famous goulash. The pair finish their time in Budapest, where Barney and Bradley meet a world-famous escapologist.

programme.title: Whose Line Is It Anyway? USA

programme.title: Whose Line Is It Anyway? USA
programme.desc: A lively round of Questions at airport security and guest Tiffany Coyne blasting out an 80s anthem.

programme.title: Important Things With Demetri Martin

programme.title: Barnwood Builders
programme.sub-title: Taking Down a Huge, New England Style Barn
programme.desc: Mark and the guys make a rare trip north to dismantle an enormous 200-year-old barn. This New England-style barn is so big it takes extra hands to get the wood down, and a crane to lift out the valuable beams.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: The boys are back in Alaska (although Discovery dropped the states mention in the title after the first season) hoping to strike it rich mining for gold. Their first effort was anything but rich and glorious, however, as the crew led by Todd Hoffman and his father, Jack, sunk $250,000 into their dream and came away with just $20,000 worth of gold. The dismal summer was filled with injuries, malfunctioning equipment and constant fighting among the greenhorn miners, yet their serious case of gold fever trumps any talk of giving up and leads to a new operating plan in order to salvage their dream. The series also keeps tabs on the efforts of teenager Parker Schnabel and old-timer Dakota Fred to hit the mother lode at separate sites.

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me

programme.title: Dont Tell the Bride
programme.sub-title: The One with the Skydiving Bride
programme.desc: John and his fiancee Jackie live in Kirkintilloch, an old mining town on the outskirts of Glasgow. Country boy John was born there and has never left, but city girl Jackie hails from Glasgows West End and has always dreamt of a sophisticated and glamorous wedding. John has his head in the clouds for his brides big day and wants to throw Jackie out of a plane at 10,000 feet on the morning of her wedding.

programme.title: Dont Tell the Bride
programme.desc: Luke, 22, and Alex, 25, met ten months ago when working on Ibiza. Despite not being together for very long, they knew they are made for each other. So after just six months, Luke decided to propose. Money is tight, but this hasnt stopped Alex dreaming of a traditional wedding, surrounded by all her friends and family. However, Luke has got very different ideas and tries to pull off the best Ibiza wedding ever.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Paul Damico is President of Moes Southwest Grill, one of the fastest growing restaurant chains in the world, which has 10,000 employees serving over 150,000 guests every day. Here, he goes undercover in his company.

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: In the first of an explosive two-part special, Gordon tries to turn around the fortunes of Los Angeles restaurant, the Burger Kitchen. Its only been open for 16 months but has already changed its menu more than 10 times, as well as going through 10 chefs and 10 waitresses, and owner Alan has spent his sons inheritance on the restaurant without permission, leading to much family conflict.

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: The explosive drama continues as Gordon is still in Los Angeles struggling to bring together the fragmented Saffron family and their failing restaurant, the Burger Kitchen. programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA

programme.desc: A portrait of Field Marshal Erwin Rommel, beginning with his initially successful exploits in the North African desert until his defeat by Montgomery. Returning to Berlin, he becomes involved with Colonel Von Stauffenbergs plot to assassinate Hitler - but when the dictator escapes the bomb and the conspirators are rounded up, Rommel, because of his high standing with the German public, is offered the choice of suicide.

programme.title: The Wild Thornberrys Movie
programme.desc: A feature-length spin-off from the TV series, the Thornberry family - led by natural history film-maker Colonel Radcliff Thornberry - head to deepest Africa. Once there, daughter Eliza - after meeting a shaman - can talk to the animals, a skill that stands her in good stead to foil a dastardly plot by poachers to kill a herd of elephants for their ivory.

programme.title: The Swan Princess
programme.desc: A beautiful princess falls in love with a prince from another land, but an exiled magician who wants her for himself conjures up a spell to transform her into a swan. Forced to embark on a dangerous quest to reverse the magic, the princess is helped along by some new-found animal friends.

programme.title: The Canterville Ghost
programme.desc: Sir Simon de Canterville has been haunting the grounds of his country estate for more than 300 years, but he soon meets his match when he tries to scare off a modern-day American family that just moved in.

programme.title: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
programme.desc: The sequel to `Madagascar, in which New York Zoo animals, Alex the Lion, Marty the Zebra, Melman the Giraffe and Gloria the Hippo, still stranded on Madagascar, start to leave the island. All of a sudden, they land in the wilderness of Africa, where Alex meets the rest of his family, but has trouble communicating with them after spending so much time at the Central Park Zoo.

programme.title: Rugrats in Paris: The Movie
programme.desc: The Rugrats are in Paris where Chuckies widowed father has been called on to mend an animated monster in a theme park, but its all a ploy by Coco LaBouche - the parks head, to get appointed head of a major company. As she and her henchman Jean-Claude plan to ensnare him, only the rest of the Rugrats can stop him falling for her charms.

programme.title: Small Foot
programme.desc: Migo is a friendly Yeti who discovers something that he didnt know existed: a human. When his fellow villagers refuse to believe him, Migo embarks on an epic journey to find the mysterious creature that can put him back in good graces.

programme.desc: Sir Simon de Canterville has been haunting the grounds of his country estate for more than 300 years, but he soon meets his match when he tries to scare off a modern-day American family that just moved in.

programme.title: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
programme.desc: The sequel to `Madagascar, in which New York Zoo animals, Alex the Lion, Marty the Zebra, Melman the Giraffe and Gloria the Hippo, still stranded on Madagascar, start to leave the island. All of a sudden, they land in the wilderness of Africa, where Alex meets the rest of his family, but has trouble communicating with them after spending so much time at the Central Park Zoo.

programme.title: Rugrats in Paris: The Movie
programme.desc: The Rugrats are in Paris where Chuckies widowed father has been called on to mend an animated monster in a theme park, but its all a ploy by Coco LaBouche - the parks head, to get appointed head of a major company. As she and her henchman Jean-Claude plan to ensnare him, only the rest of the Rugrats can stop him falling for her charms.

programme.title: Small Foot
programme.desc: Migo is a friendly Yeti who discovers something that he didnt know existed: a human. When his fellow villagers refuse to believe him, Migo embarks on an epic journey to find the mysterious creature that can put him back in good graces.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: Concerned that his half-human grandson isnt showing his vampire side, Dracula and his friends put the boy through a `monster-in-training boot camp just as Dracs old-school father decides to pay a visit.

programme.title: Turbo
programme.desc: A snail gets the chance to escape his slow-paced life and race in the Indianapolis 500 when a freak accident gives him the power of superspeed.

programme.title: Rugrats Go Wild
programme.desc: The children and their bickering family are stranded on a desert island. Fortunately help is at hand from the Thornberry family, who are visiting the island to film a rare snow leopard. Once again, animal-understanding Eliza saves the day.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 3: A Monster Vacation
programme.desc: Mavis surprises Dracula with plans for a fun-filled summer voyage on a monster cruise. As the pack starts enjoying colossal buffets and exotic excursions, Drac finds himself falling for the ships intriguing but dangerous captain. He soon learns that trying to balance family, friends and romance might just be too much to handle. even for the worlds most powerful vampire.

programme.title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie
programme.desc: Two overly-imaginative pranksters accidentally hypnotise their headmaster into thinking that hes a ridiculously enthusiastic, incredibly dimwitted superhero named Captain Underpants.

programme.title: The Wild Thornberrys Movie
programme.desc: A feature-length spin-off from the TV series, the Thornberry family - led by natural history film-maker Colonel Radcliff Thornberry - head to deepest Africa. Once there, daughter Eliza - after meeting a shaman - can talk to the animals, a skill that stands her in good stead to foil a dastardly plot by poachers to kill a herd of elephants for their ivory.

programme.title: Over the Hedge
programme.desc: An opportunistic raccoon teaches fellow animals about the edible treasures that the new humans in the neighbourhood conveniently leave outdoors.

programme.title: The Swan Princess
programme.desc: A beautiful princess falls in love with a prince from another land, but an exiled magician who wants her for himself conjures up a spell to transform her into a swan. Forced to embark on a dangerous quest to reverse the magic, the princess is helped along by some new-found animal friends.

programme.title: Noahs Ark
programme.desc: A pair of mice, Vini and Tom, devise a plan to sneak onto Noahs Ark.

programme.title: Noahs Ark
programme.desc: A pair of mice, Vini and Tom, devise a plan to sneak onto Noahs Ark.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Saturday Night
programme.desc: To celebrate the release of the film Saturday Night, join the Cinema List as we explore 50 years of hilarious films from the SNL cast - including Waynes World, Bridesmaids and more.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: A reporter in Iraq may just have the story of a lifetime when he meets Lyn Cassady, a guy who claims to be a former member of the US Armys New Earth Army, a unit that employs paranormal powers in their missions.

programme.title: Mr. Deeds
programme.desc: Deeds is much-loved in his small town, but following the death of a long-lost uncle, who also happens to be a billionaire tycoon, Deeds inherits a fortune and heads for the big city to run his uncles company. When a media frenzy ensues surrounding Deeds inheritance, reporter Babe Bennett goes undercover to out Deeds as the small-town fool she thinks he is.

programme.title: The Hangover
programme.desc: A crazy Las Vegas bachelor party turns into a race against time when three hung-over groomsmen awaken after a night of drunken debauchery to find that the groom has gone missing, and attempt to get him to the alter in time for his wedding.

programme.title: The Hangover Part II
programme.desc: A group of friends go to Thailand for a quiet and restrained stag party, but are dismayed to wake up in a mysterious hotel room, with a man missing and no memory of the night before. Of course, Alan manages to get himself in with the crowd.

programme.title: The Hangover Part III
programme.desc: Phil, Stu and Doug take Alan on a road trip to help him through a personal crisis.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Rachel Chu is happy to accompany her longtime boyfriend, Nick, to his best friends wedding in Singapore. Shes also surprised to learn that Nicks family is extremely wealthy and hes considered one of the countrys most eligible bachelors. Thrust into the spotlight, Rachel must now contend with jealous socialites, quirky relatives and something far, far worse: Nicks disapproving mother.

programme.title: Bad Teacher
programme.desc: A rude, drug-abusing educator vies with a perky colleague for the attentions of a rich and handsome substitute teacher.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Professor Sherman, a 450lb scientist, falls for his new colleague Professor Carla Purty, but out on a date, hes humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion hes only tested previously on hamsters and - hey presto - he turns into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet, Buddy Love.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Sherman is getting married to Denise Gains but his alter-ego Buddy Love keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts Buddys genes, but an accident and a dog hair see Buddy take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, Sherman and Denise perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until Buddy steals it.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: The stars of a 1970s sci-fi show - now scraping a living through re-runs and sci-fi conventions - are beamed aboard an alien spacecraft. Believing the casts heroic on-screen dramas are historical documents of real-life adventures, the band of aliens turn to the ailing celebrities for help in their quest to overcome the oppressive regime in their solar system.

programme.title: Superbad
programme.desc: Two inseparable best friends navigate the last weeks of high school and are invited to a gigantic house party. Together with their nerdy friend, they spend a long day trying to score enough alcohol to supply the party and inebriate two girls in order to kick-start their sex lives before they go off to college. Their quest is complicated after one of them falls in with two inept cops who are determined to show him a good time.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, theyve hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: Fifty Shades Darker
programme.desc: Shadowy figures from Christian Greys past threaten to destroy his rekindled romance with Anastasia Steele.

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: Frank is a retired Lt Col in the US army. Hes blind and impossible to get along with. Charlie is at school and is looking forward to going to university; to help pay for a trip home for Christmas, he agrees to look after Frank over thanksgiving. Franks niece says this will be easy money, but she didnt reckon on Frank spending his Thanksgiving in New York.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: Nobodys Fool
programme.desc: Based on Richard Russos novel of an immature 60-year-old and the people in his orbit in an upstate New York town.

programme.title: Flashdance
programme.desc: A young female welder dreams of becoming a professional dancer and struggles against all the odds to realise her dream. However, in her effort to succeed, she discovers that getting to the top is far from easy. Giorgio Moroders composition `Flashdance (What a Feeling), sung by Irene Cara, won an Academy Award for Best Original Song.

programme.title: Dear John
programme.desc: Whilst on leave, a Marine falls in love with a college student. The long-distance relationship is then tested when the Marine decides to re-enlist post-9/11.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: Following the adventures of The Dreamettes, an all-girl singing group. Theyre going nowhere fast until they meet fast-talking car salesman-come-manager who has ambitions to make a fortune selling black music to a white audience. He persuades them to become backing singers for James `Thunder Early, but the larger-than-life lead singer Effie White must step out of the spotlight in favour of the more image-friendly Deena Jones.

programme.title: Lee
programme.desc: The story of photographer Elizabeth `Lee Miller, a fashion model who became an acclaimed war correspondent for Vogue magazine during World War II.

programme.title: Valentines Day
programme.desc: Following a group of Los Angeles residents who try to find their way through the highs and lows of love during a single day.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Weaving in and out of the love lives of eight loosely inter-related couples. The bachelor Prime Minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law is flirting with one of his colleagues, a writer heads off to France and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his father for advice on matters of the heart.

programme.title: The Fisher King
programme.desc: When a DJs sardonic exhortation to a late-night caller to wipe out a bar full of yuppies is taken literally, his world falls apart. Years later, on the point of suicide, he is saved by a similar casualty, a former medievalist whose wife was a victim of the bar bloodbath, and offered a chance for redemption by the mans quest for the Holy Grail.

programme.title: Fifty Shades Freed
programme.desc: Believing theyve left behind the shadowy figures from the past, billionaire Christian Grey and his new wife, Anastasia, fully embrace their inextricable connection and shared life of luxury. But just as the Greys begin to step into their new roles, sinister events come to light and jeopardise their happy ending before it even begins.

programme.title: The Wiz
programme.desc: In this version of the classic story - based on the smash Broadway musical - Dorothy is a shy 24-year-old Harlem kindergarten teacher who is brought by a snowstorm to the mysterious Land of Oz, a sprawling, decaying, nightmarish, and dangerous megalopolis that resembles the physical characteristics of New York City.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out of the Shadows
programme.desc: The turtles spring into action to battle Shredder, mad scientist Baxter Stockman, Bebop, Rocksteady and the notorious Krang.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Four unlikely warriors rise from the sewers and join forces with fearless reporter April ONeil to save New York from Shredder and his evil minions.

programme.title: Look Whos Talking Now
programme.desc: In the third of the `Look Whos Talking comedies, two dogs enter the Umbriacco household - and take an immediate dislike to each other. When Molly loses her job, husband James is forced to take on a demanding role as private airline pilot. The children miss him, so he buys a dog to cheer them up. However, when Jamess glamorous boss asks his family to look after her poodle, sparks fly between the dogs.

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: Grown-up Peter Pan has to return to Neverland to rediscover his true identity in order to rescue his children from the clutches of the evil Captain Hook. Peter has grown up into a workaholic executive but takes time off for a holiday in London. Once there, his children are kidnapped by Hook, and Peter must throw off his corporate image and go back to Neverland to save his children.

programme.title: Zathura: A Space Adventure
programme.desc: Family adventure about two squabbling siblings who find a mysterious old board game in their basement. The bickering brothers discover the game has magical powers when a chance roll of the dice sends their house into deep space, where they must battle with aliens and work together to stay alive.

An MIB agent turns to the only man who can help him save the world from a rampaging, shape-shifting alien which has taken on the outward appearance of a sexy lingerie model.

programme.title: Men in Black 3
programme.desc: Agent J goes back to the swinging 60s in a time-travelling mission to save his partner from a murderous alien.

programme.title: Brewsters Millions
programme.desc: Montgomery Brewster is a low-league baseball player who suddenly finds out that a distant relative has left him $300 million. However, theres a catch: he has to waste $30 million in just 30 days without anyone knowing hes doing it.

programme.title: Dads Army
programme.desc: In 1940, with a German invasion looming, the defence of Walmington-on-Sea is in the hands of local bank manager Captain Mainwaring and a motley collection of volunteers. After a series of blunders, the Home Guard finally get the glory they deserve.

programme.title: Parenthood

His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: Housesitter
programme.desc: Newton Davis builds a dream home for his childhood sweetheart and is promptly dumped. Devastated, he seeks solace in the arms of a waitress, but sneaks off into the night once hes had his fun. The spurned waitress exacts her revenge by moving into the empty house and masquerading as Newtons wife. At this stage, things start getting complicated.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: Brewsters Millions
programme.desc: Montgomery Brewster is a low-league baseball player who suddenly finds out that a distant relative has left him $300 million. However, theres a catch: he has to waste $30 million in just 30 days without anyone knowing hes doing it.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: The Blues Brothers
programme.desc: The story of a pair of blues musicians who try to raise the money to save an orphanage by reuniting their old band - nearly writing off Chicago in the process.

programme.title: See No Evil, Hear No Evil
programme.desc: Lighthearted adventures of a pair of news vendors in New York - one deaf, one blind - who go on the run when they are blamed for the murder of a customer. Each has seen - or heard - just a whiff of a clue, and a frantic chase ensues as the duo struggle to clear their names.

programme.title: Sixteen Candles
programme.desc: A teen suffers the pain of adolescence as she longs for Mr. Right while fending off the advances of the class clown.

programme.title: Midnight Run
programme.desc: A gruff cop turned bounty hunter captures a fugitive accountant accused of fraud and sets off from New York for Los Angeles to collect his prize. However, he is unaware that both the Mafia and the FBI are also on the accountants trail and hot on their heels.

programme.title: Midnight Run

programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: Sequel to the sci-fi comedy about a top secret government task force set up to deal with unruly extraterrestrials. An MIB agent turns to the only man who can help him save the world from a rampaging, shape-shifting alien which has taken on the outward appearance of a sexy lingerie model.

programme.title: Men in Black 3
programme.desc: Agent J goes back to the swinging 60s in a time-travelling mission to save his partner from a murderous alien.

programme.title: Dads Army

programme.title: Bridget Jones: The Edge of Reason
programme.desc: Bridgets brand new relationship with Darcy has taken a plummet due to her jealousy of his workmate. Having previously left the publishing house she worked for to avoid her boss, Daniel, with whom she had an unsuccessful romance, she finds him along for the ride on her new job, which takes her to Thailand, and almost into his arms.

programme.title: Bridget Joness Baby
programme.desc: Befuddled mom-to-be Bridget Jones must figure out which of the two men in her life is the father of her child.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Snow White and the Huntsman
programme.desc: In a twist to the fairy tale, the Huntsman ordered to take Snow White into the woods to be killed winds up becoming her protector and mentor in a quest to vanquish the Evil Queen.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winters War
programme.desc: A huntsman and a fellow warrior help an ice queen battle the evil sister who betrayed her.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania
programme.desc: Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the counts teen-aged daughter.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: Concerned that his half-human grandson isnt showing his vampire side, Dracula and his friends put the boy through a `monster-in-training boot camp just as Dracs old-school father decides to pay a visit.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 3: A Monster Vacation
programme.desc: Mavis surprises Dracula with plans for a fun-filled summer voyage on a monster cruise. As the pack starts enjoying colossal buffets and exotic excursions, Drac finds himself falling for the ships intriguing but dangerous captain. He soon learns that trying to balance family, friends and romance might just be too much to handle. even for the worlds most powerful vampire.

programme.title: Rise of the Guardians
programme.desc: Winter sprite Jack Frost must save the day when an evil boogeyman schemes to stop the worlds children from believing in Santa Claus, the Easter Bunny and other immortal Guardians.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, theyve hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect
programme.desc: When a new student joins her colleges female a cappella group, she takes the women out of their comfort zone of traditional pieces and introduces them to innovative arrangements.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2
programme.desc: Now graduating seniors, the Barden Bellas enter an international a cappella competition which no American team has ever won.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 3
programme.desc: After the highs of winning the world championships, the Bellas find themselves split apart. But when they get the chance to reunite for an overseas USO tour, this group of awesome nerds will come together to make some music one last time.

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: A group set out on safari into the heart of the Congo. Each have their different reasons for the trip, but nothing could have prepared them for the greatest danger - a troop of intelligent killer apes.

programme.title: The Ring Two
programme.desc: Sequel to the cult horror about a videotape that brings death to anyone who watches it. programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: Columbus and Tallahassee have orchestrated a way to survive a world overrun by zombies. With only fear keeping the `big wuss Columbus alive, Tallahassee wants to eradicate the `last Twinkie on Earth. The duo join forces with Wichita and Little Rock who have a style and tact of their own when it comes to dealing with the flesh-eating chaos.

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process cant be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.title: Strange Darling
programme.desc: Nothing is what it seems when a twisted one-night stand spirals into a serial killers vicious murder spree.

programme.title: Ouija
programme.desc: A group of friends must confront their most terrifying fears when they awaken the dark powers of an ancient spirit board.

programme.title: Ouija: Origin of Evil
programme.desc: A seance scam leads to terror when an evil spirit possesses a widows youngest daughter in 1967 Los Angeles.

programme.title: Sick
programme.desc: While quarantining at her familys lake house during the pandemic, Parker and her best friend are threatened by an unexpected visitor.

programme.title: The Front Room
programme.desc: Everything goes to hell for newly pregnant Belinda after her mother-in-law moves in and tries to get her claws on the child.

programme.title: Speak No Evil
programme.desc: A dream holiday turns into a living nightmare when an American couple and their daughter spend the weekend at a British familys idyllic country estate.

programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: US remake of the cult Japanese chiller about a journalist who faces a race against time when she investigates the legend of a strange videotape which allegedly claims the life of the viewer one week after watching it.

programme.title: The Ring Two
programme.desc: Sequel to the cult horror about a videotape that brings death to anyone who watches it. The journalist from the original film destroys the tape but is pursued by the demon that cursed it and who now wants to possess her son. The Japanese director of the original directs this sequel.

programme.title: Ouija

programme.title: The Front Room

programme.title: Gothika
programme.desc: A strange car accident leaves criminal psychiatrist Miranda with amnesia and locked up in her own prison, accused of murdering her own husband, the director of the hospital. Haunted by terrifying spirits, she must escape to save her sanity.

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: Columbus and Tallahassee have orchestrated a way to survive a world overrun by zombies. programme.title: Strange Darling
programme.desc: Nothing is what it seems when a twisted one-night stand spirals into a serial killers vicious murder spree.

programme.title: Escape From Alcatraz
programme.desc: Fact-based story set in Americas former maximum-security prison, from which escape was supposed to be impossible. For habitual jailbreaker Frank Morris, however, Alcatraz is just another set of bars and walls that will never hold him.

programme.title: Some Other Woman
programme.desc: Forced to give up her own dreams while living on a tropical island, Eve Carver encounters a strange woman who begins to take over her life.

programme.title: Dangerous Waters
programme.desc: A young woman, her new boyfriend and her single mother embark on a sailing adventure to Bermuda. However, when criminals suddenly attack their boat, the pleasure trip turns into a desperate fight for survival and a quest for vengeance.

programme.title: Caddo Lake
programme.desc: When an 8-year-old girl mysteriously vanishes, a series of past deaths and disappearances start to link together, forever altering a broken familys history.

programme.title: Greedy People
programme.desc: Residents of a small island town navigate a murder and the discovery of a million dollars, a series of increasingly bad decisions upend the once peaceful community.

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: An amnesiac symbologist and a doctor race across Europe and against time to stop a madman from unleashing a virus that could wipe out half of the worlds population.

programme.title: The Bikeriders
programme.desc: Over the course of a decade, a Midwestern motorcycle club evolves from a gathering place for local outsiders to a sinister gang, threatening the original groups way of life.

programme.title: Escape From Alcatraz
programme.desc: Fact-based story set in Americas former maximum-security prison, from which escape was supposed to be impossible. For habitual jailbreaker Frank Morris, however, Alcatraz is just another set of bars and walls that will never hold him.

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent is taunted by calls from a would-be killer who has detailed information about the agent - including the fact that he failed to save President John F Kennedy from assassination. The caller is revealed as an ex-CIA assassin, and the agent, who is investigating a threat to the current president, is determined not to let history repeat itself.

programme.title: The Perfect Storm
programme.desc: Seafaring drama based on the true story of a commercial fishing boat crew who become caught in a terrifying storm off the coast of Massachusetts. In the autumn of 1991, a fishing boat captain is determined to set sail despite the adverse weather conditions, but when the ice machine breaks down his decision to brave the storm rather than lose his catch results in a battle against 100ft waves.

programme.title: Eye in the Sky
programme.desc: A lieutenant general and a colonel face political opposition after ordering a drone missile strike to take out a group of suicide bombers in Nairobi, Kenya.

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: A federal agent and an Interpol detective play a cat-and-mouse game with cunning illusionists who rob corrupt business leaders during their performances, then funnel the money to members of the audience.

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: Set in Depression-era Franklin County, Virginia, a bootlegging gang is threatened by a new deputy and other authorities who want a cut of their profits.

programme.title: Contraband
programme.desc: To protect his brother-in-law from a drug lord, a former smuggler heads to Panama to score millions of dollars in counterfeit bills.

programme.title: Caddo Lake
programme.desc: When an 8-year-old girl mysteriously vanishes, a series of past deaths and disappearances start to link together, forever altering a broken familys history.

programme.title: A Place Called Silence
programme.desc: Chen Yutong, a girls middle school student, was bullied at school, but her mother Li Han was unable to save her daughter from the "hell." Everyone around her turned a blind eye, and a collective silence brewed greater violence.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: When Karen tries to woo Stanley away from Scranton, Michael fights back, dragging her ex, Jim, into his war. Meanwhile, the existence of a `Finer Things Club further disturbs Dunder Mifflins calm.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: After Ryan excludes Michael from a corporate wilderness retreat, Michael heads into the woods for his own survival adventure with nothing but the suit on his back. At work, Jim tries to revolutionise the office birthday party.

programme.title: Will and Grace
programme.sub-title: Last of the Really Odd Lovers
programme.desc: Grace is reluctant to tell Will about her boorish new boyfriend and, likewise, Will doesnt want her to know about his relationship with a younger man from the video store. Meanwhile, Jack is excited to have a fan until she begins to appear a little obsessed with him.

programme.title: Will and Grace
programme.desc: Grace tries to keep the peace between her slovenly boyfriend and a resentful Will, and Jack plans to meet his father for the first time.

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.sub-title: An American Girl in Paris (Part Deux)
programme.desc: Carrie learns a few home truths about Aleksandr from his ex-wife. In Manhattan, Samantha loses her sex drive for the first ever time, thanks to the chemo, putting a strain on her relationship with Smith. Charlotte and Harry are struggling to adopt a baby, and Steves mum has a stroke. Meanwhile, back in Paris, Carrie wrestles with her feelings for Aleksandr and Big.

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: At Mirandas birthday party, Carrie and her friends vow to stop searching for the perfect mate.

programme.title: Entourage
programme.desc: Ari is suspicious when Terrance offers to sell him his share of the business and Eric has to go to the doctor after hearing some unpleasant news. Elsewhere, Drama gets out of control during his big audition, and Turtle gets ready for Jamie-Lynns departure.

programme.desc: Chikidee is making slow but steady progress learning to fly, so Tommy and Tallulah try to help by making her a gigantic paper aeroplane.
